updateAvailable.message: An update is available for Aktru Recorder. Update the app now?

error.critical: A critical error occurred. The app will quit.
error.ffmpegNotFound: FFMPEG could not be found. Please contact the developer.
error.unableToParseLicenseData: Unable to parse the license data. The app will quit.
error.unableToProduceFingerprint: Unable to produce a unique fingerprint of the system

ongoingRecording.content: Aktru Recorder cannot quit while it is recording. You must first stop the recording in the application window.
ongoingRecording.title: Application cannot shut down right now

scheduleEnabled.content: Aktru Recorder cannot quit while scheduled recording is enabled. You must first disable it in the application settings.
scheduleEnabled.title: Application cannot shut down

error.unlicensed: Your computer is not licensed to run this application.

balloon.runningInBackground: Aktru Recorder is running in the background. Click the application icon in the notification area to open it.

library.deleteDialogContent: Are you sure you want to delete this entry and all of its data? This operation cannot be reverted.
library.loadingError: Failed to load entries. The database may be corrupted or unavailable.

noVideoSourceWarning.text: Select and enable at least one video source to make the schedule settings available.

passwordDialog.text: Please, enter your password to access the expert settings.

resetPtzCameraPresetCheckbox.label: Reset the camera's preset to the default one after each recording

sakaiUrlField.placeholder: Enter the Sakai URL where you want to add the recorded entries

validationErrors.invalidScheduleUrl: Schedule Service is not detected at the specified address!

confirmDialog.title: Confirmation Required

entryTypeField.label: Type of class
entryTypeField.placeholder: Type of class: Lecture, Seminar, Lab, etc.

toggle.title: Click to enable or disable audio capture
Click to enable or disable video source capture

tooltip.disabled: Apps sounds capture is unavailable with current settings

toggle.title: Click to enable or disable desktop capture

manageButton.title: Manage your library and app settings

title.scheduledRecordingEnabled:
Changing sources is not available
while scheduled recording is enabled.

content.manual: Are you sure you want to delete the active recording?
content.scheduled: Are you sure you want to delete the active recording? The next one will be started on schedule.

error.audioSourceInitError: Couldn't initialize your audio capture device. Please, make sure it is connected or select another one.
error.cameraSourceInitError: Couldn't initialize your camera capture device. Please, make sure it is connected or select another one.
error.desktopAudioSourceInitError: Couldn't initialize your desktop audio capture device. Please, make sure your antivirus software isn't blocking screen/desktop capture.
error.desktopSourceInitError: Couldn't initialize your desktop capture device. Please, make sure it is connected or select another one.
error.errorWritingToFile: Recording data couldn't be saved. Please, check if there is enough space on your storage device.
error.failedToCheckDiskSpace: Failed to check free disk space.
error.insufficientDiskSpace: Not enough free disk space. At least {{size}} is required for recording.
error.noAudioSource: No audio source is selected, but audio capture is enabled. Please, select an audio capture device.
error.noCameraSource: No camera source is selected, but camera capture is enabled. Please, select a camera capture device.
error.noDesktopSource: No desktop source is selected, but desktop capture is enabled. Please, select a desktop capture device.
error.noVideoSourcesSelected: No video source is selected. Please, select at least one source: camera or desktop.
error.recordingPathNotSpecified: Recordings path is not specified. Please, check the settings.
